name: virtual-leveldown
description: $ dat import invalid.json —dry-run # do dat import, but with require(‘memdown’) 1. when dat does a .get or .createReadStream use require(‘leveldown’) 2. when dat does a .put or .createWriteStream, use require(‘memdown’) virtual-leveldown   - on first read, read from actual backend   - on all subsequent reads, or any writes, only touch in-memory copy
author: Finn Pauls
